position: Skeptic who thinks free will is likely an illusion.

the_case: Let me make the case for skeptic who thinks free will is likely an illusion.. You've thought deeply about whether we have genuine choice or if everything is predetermined. You lean toward determinism and find it "logical" that a deity wouldn't give us free will but then judge us for it.
